extendedInfo.description: DON'T TOUCH YOUR PHONE WHILE TEXTING DOWNLOAD THIS FREE APP!!!   NEW FEATURE! THE APP NOW CONVERTS YOUR VOICE INTO TEXT SO NO NEED TO TYPE!!! âTHANKS TO OUR 1 MILLION USERS FOR SPREADING THE WORDâ PRESS QUOTE:Text'nDrive will "appeal to business types who frequently find themselves whizzing down life's freeways with an urgent email to send or receive." - Kit Eaton, Fast Company Keep your hands on the wheel and eyes on the road with this innovative technology. One of the 30 Best iPhone Apps according to TechCrunch!This app allows you to be a responsible driver and stay connected by reading unlimited messages for free. For unlimited voice reply and exclusive features try our Pro Version. â Launch Offer â In App Upgrade to Pro 50% OFF â  "it's worth every penny you pay for it, and more." - Steve Sande, TUAW FEATURES:â Reads emails and SMS out loud (up to 45 words)â Text-to-speech technology â No typing requiredâ Tested on Gmail, Me, Yahoo, Hotmail, AOL & compatible with most mail providersâ Works with any hands-free devices such as speakerphones, Bluetooth headsets or built-in car systems. (Android 2.2+)â Pro version: Reply with your voice, reads 10 times more words, multiple email accounts and much more... Upgrade today 50% OFF BENEFITS: â Maintain road safety while staying productive â Be compliant with local legislation on mobile use while driving â Lessen accidents caused by texting or emailing while operating a motor vehicle â Save on insurance premiums by helping maintain an accident free record â Diminish the risk of injury or death caused by distracted driving Eliminate the temptation of reading your emails and SMS while driving by listening to a voice that reads your emails and SMS in real time and reply by Voice. Drive Safely by Texting while driving without looking at your phone!!TESTIMONIALS: "This app is brilliant and could be a real life saver. I confess I am always tempted to check my emails when I'm driving and I almost had an accident 2 weeks ago because of that. Since I installed Text'nDrive App, no more typing while driving... a nice lady voice reads me emails directly on my Bluetooth handset and I can focus on the road without having to touch my phone. I will probably upgrade to the pro version to be able to reply to my emails with my voice. GREAT APP! I highly recomment it for anyone who does not have it yet." - Claire Rodriguez "I was a bit skeptical at first but this app works out well. Will give it a few more runs but I think I'll upgrade to the pro version soon. Very satisfied." - Carl Devine TextandDrive supports all Yahoo accounts with POP access including ymail and Yahoo Plus, and most regular Yahoo email accounts. Some older Yahoo email accounts do not have the option to enable a POP account. TextânDrive works with Exchange only if the IMAP protocol is enable for your email account. If youâre not sure please ask your IT support to enable it for you and ask them the incoming and outgoing server to use with the corresponding ports. ________________________________________ The Text'nDrive team is dedicated to responsive development and support. If you have questions or criticism please send us a note at support@textndrive.com. We may be able to fix your issues in less time than it would take to write a negative review. We are very attentive to your feedback/suggestions/comments. Your input will allow us to further enhance and develop new features for the Txt'nDrive voice texting App.DriveSafely today download Text'nDrive hands free texting app now.

reviews.title: Requires Internet Access!
reviews.comment: If you don\'t have a Data Plan or don\'t want to use it, or if you are travelling in another country with no Data Plan - this App will not work at all, as it requires internet access! DriveSafe.ly also requires Internet access! The only app I\'ve found so far that does not require Internet Access is Auto SMS.
